Greetings, I have two questions, I have searched the forums and am unable to find the right topic though Im sure its probably been asked before.  I use Quest 3.53 Pro and QDK.

1 - Im creating a table with food on it, I would like the food to be taken off the table and eaten.

2 - I have a chest of jewels, I would like the chest to be able to be opened and the jewels to be taken. 

So it is object on another object and
object in another object.

I appreciate any help!
